definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Communicate with orphanage directors and hospital staff.
sentences.chinese: 与儿童福利院院长及医院职员联络。

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare, is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至怀疑现代福利院，是民政部门的小金库。

sentences.english: threatens to report the other parent to welfare
sentences.chinese: 威胁将对方的父母送去福利院？

sentences.english: Many people living in institutions have lost their sense of self.
sentences.chinese: 许多生活在福利院的人已经失去了个性意识。

sentences.english: They then reportedly sent them to welfare centres from where they were put up for international adoption.
sentences.chinese: 然后这些婴儿被送到福利院，等待接受海外收养。

sentences.english: I think this is the welfare of children living in the greatest sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我想这就是生活在福利院儿童的最大悲哀。

sentences.english: The social worker advised them to put their handicapped child into care .
sentences.chinese: 社会形态工作者提议他们将其残疾儿送到福利院去。

sentences.english: The main job for me is helping the orphanage in the SWI and the children who became children because of the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的工作重点就是福利院的孤儿和地震孤儿。

definition: home of respect for aged/nursing home
to take in and care for (an elderly person, a dog etc)/to adopt (a child)/adoption
"left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them
